# Fertilizers Product Images

Place foliar fertilizer product images in this folder. Images are loaded automatically based on product names in the products database.

## Expected Images

- hyrich-high-n.jpg
- hyrich-high-k.jpg
- hyrich-high-p.jpg
- hyrich-calcium.jpg
- hyrich-zinc.jpg
- farm-booster.jpg
- zinbor.jpg
- root-en-tuber.jpg
- supercop.jpg

Each image filename should match the `imageUrl` property in the products database (without the folder path).
